items.text: full on off, pushed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: stays back and tucks to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: stays back and turns it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: plants the front foot forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: straight length ball, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle, turned away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: flicks a fullish one behind square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, 1 run

items.text: spins in sharply, backs away and punches to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: full, defended into off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: short, straightening, backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: blocks a length ball on the front foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: back of a length, punched to short midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: cuts from close to off and finds cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: pushes at one that spins away and flies towards point off the outside of the bat
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.preText: Nineteen overs before the drinks break. That's fleeting.
items.text: back of a length, shuffles and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: spins away, rocks back and cuts gloriously through the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, FOUR runs

items.text: closes the face to a fuller one and gets a leading edge to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: pushes a fuller one to extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: plants the front foot down and nails a slog sweep one-bounce to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, 1 run

items.text: pitched up outside off, driven past the cover fielder diving to his left, making a little room on leg stump to find the gap
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, FOUR runs

items.text: all those dot balls are showing on Rayudu as he goes for a big shot over extra cover and skews it straight up. Lands safely though, past the reach of cover running back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, 2 runs

items.text: gets forward to block a slider angled into middle and off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: opens the face as he drive this one with a little extra flight and finds a single at sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, 1 run

items.text: drags his length back and Rohit is ever so comfortable punching it off the back foot to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: appeal for lbw but Rayudu has managed a big inside edge onto pad - even if he does look awkward doing it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run
